Comment: The problem with countering misinformation is that you're countering after the fact - and its extremely hard to counter it because usually misinformation and disinformation have nuggets of truth within them that allow people to easily grasp on to, and it feeds into their own ideology and desires for belonging.  And they're not gonna change course on things without hearing it from someone they trust.  Dems need to be proactive about having honest conversations in areas where they'd never been expected to set foot... they need to go into those places and listen, and empathize, and ask those people how they would want to see the issues they face solved... only then may they be able to build the trust necessary to counter disinformation and misinformation.
